Key Match Events: Mark Wood was bowled by Bumrah
Jonny Bairstow was bowled by Mohammed Shami
Ben Stokes was bowled by Mohammed Shami
Jos Buttler was stumped by Rahul b Kuldeep Yadav
Liam Livingstone was lbw b Kuldeep Yadav
Chris Woakes was stumped by Rahul b Jadeja
Adil Rashid was bowled by Mohammed Shami
Mark Wood was bowled by Bumrah
Post-Match Reflections: Rohit Sharma was named Player of the Match
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was played at the Bharat Ratna Shri Atal Bihari Vajpayee Ekana Cricket Stadium in Lucknow
The match was a day-night 50-over match
The match was part of the ICC Cricket World Cup 2023-24
Others: The match was officiated by Adrian Holdstock, Rod Tucker, Ahsan Raza, Chris Brown, and Richie Richardson
The match was broadcast by ESPN
